attributes.action: Pay rise for all NHS staff who worked during covid-19
attributes.additional_details:
The government should issue a substantial pay rise for ALL NHS staff that worked during the covid-19 outbreak, they risked their lives when nobody should have to, without the NHS the U.K would have fallen to covid-19!

MP’s see pay rises each and every year and also get expenses paid which sometimes are well over £20,000 which is almost the same as what some workers In the NHS earn in a whole year.

Therefore I wish for all MPs to not take payrise or bonuses but instead show the NHS they matter
attributes.background:
I want the government and/or parliament to issue a pay rise to all NHS staff who worked during the Covid-19 outbreak in the U.K.
After all they saved the prime minister

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:
http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/

You might like to sign and share these petitions instead:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313513 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321150
